text: Chantepérier is a commune in the Isère department in southeastern France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Chantelouve (the seat) and Le Périer.Arrêté préfectoral 18 December 2018 ==See also== *Communes of the Isère department ==References== Category:Communes of Isère
title: Chantepérier
